author: trawick
msg: Fix the detection of INT64_C() when defined in <stdint.h>.
Submitted by:    Joe Orton <joe@manyfish.co.uk>
Reviewed by:	 Jeff Trawick

author: trawick
msg: Don't use whitespace before preprocessor directives in the configure
logic.  Such whitespace breaks with some older preprocessors; a
particularly nasty break occurs on Tru64 4.0f where APR_CHECK_DEFINE
will always suceed.
Submitted by:	Joe Orton <joe@manyfish.co.uk>
Reviewed by:	Jeff Trawick

author: trawick
msg: fix some AC_MSG_RESULT()s to not include double quotes, e.g.
checking if APR supports IPv6... "yes"
and also removes the stray semi-colons.
Submitted by:	Joe Orton <joe@manyfish.co.uk>
Reviewed by:	Jeff Trawick

author: wrowe
msg: Didn't intend to commit this.  Was attempting to commit comments on
another file.  Bahhh ... more sleep would be good.

author: trawick
msg: get it to compile (hopefully) on some systems without getaddrinfo()
related trivia: disabling getaddrinfo() support on Linux has failed for
some time because the correct reentrant gethostbyname flavor isn't being used
or it is coded incorrectly
